sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { addToChart } from '../features/chart' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router' import {Container, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' const SingleProductPage = ({getsingleitem, setsingleitem}) => { const nav = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() function addItemtoChart(){ const newaddeditem = { id: getsingleitem.id, image: getsingleitem.image, title: getsingleitem.title, price: getsingleitem.price, totalPrice: getsingleitem.price, quantity: 1 } dispatch(addToChart(newaddeditem)) } const items = useSelector(state => state.chart.value.chartItems) function gobacktopreviouspage(){ nav("/shop") setsingleitem({}) } return (
{/* {getsingleitem.title}

Description: {getsingleitem.description}

Price: {getsingleitem.price} $

 */} Other items you may like:
) } export default SingleProductPage
